trans-unit.source: If the second argument is a cell array of strings, search each directory of the path for element of the cell array and return the first that matches.

trans-unit.source: If the second argument is a scalar integer, k, perform the same test in a linear autoregression model of order k, i.e., with

trans-unit.source: If the second argument is an integer n, the arguments are "x", "P1", …, "PN".
trans-unit.target: 如果第二个参数是整数 n ，自变量是 "x" ， "P1" ，...， "PN" 。

trans-unit.source: If the second argument is exactly 0, then the choice of decomposition is based on the matrix <var>A</var>. If <var>A</var> has more rows than columns then an economy-sized decomposition is returned, otherwise a regular decomposition is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 如果第二个参数是恰好为0，然后分解的选择是基于所述矩阵 <var>A</var> 。如果 <var>A</var> 的行多于列，则返回经济规模的分解，否则将计算常规分解。

trans-unit.source: If the second argument is not given, p = 2 is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供第二个参数，则使用 p = 2 。

trans-unit.source: If the second argument is omitted, it is taken to be
trans-unit.target: 如果省略第二个论点,则认为是

trans-unit.source: If the second argument is omitted, the first row is taken to be the same as the first column. If the first element of <var>r</var> is not the same as the first element of <var>c</var>, the first element of <var>c</var> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略第二个参数，则将第一行与第一列相同。如果的第一个元素 <var>r</var> 是不一样的第一个元素 <var>c</var> ，第一元件 <var>c</var> 被使用。

trans-unit.source: If the second argument is the string "grabdemo", the contents of any built-in demo blocks are extracted but not executed. The text for all code blocks is concatenated and returned as code with idx being a vector of positions of the ends of each demo block. For an easier way to extract demo blocks from files, See example.
trans-unit.target: 如果第二个参数是字符串 "grabdemo" ，则将提取任何内置演示块的内容，但不执行它们。将所有代码块的文本连接起来并作为 code 返回，其中 idx 是每个演示块末端的位置向量。有关从文件提取演示块的简便方法，请参见example。

trans-unit.source: If the second optional argument "all" is supplied, return a cell array containing the list of all files that have the same name in the path. If no files are found, return an empty cell array.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了第二个可选参数 "all" ，则返回一个单元格数组，其中包含路径中具有相同名称的所有文件的列表。如果找不到文件，则返回一个空单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: If the second output <var>V</var> is requested the volume of the enclosing convex hull is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求第二个输出 <var>V</var> ，则计算包围的凸包的体积。

trans-unit.source: If the second output <var>v</var> is requested the volume of the enclosing convex hull is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求第二个输出 <var>v</var> ，则计算包围的凸包的体积。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the coefficient matrix <var>A</var> is n-by-p, the size of the vector/array of constant terms <var>b</var> must be n-by-k.
trans-unit.target: 如果系数矩阵 <var>A</var> 的大小为n×p，则常数项 <var>b</var> 的向量/数组的大小必须为n×k。

trans-unit.source: If the sparse Cholesky factorization failed or the matrix is not Hermitian with a real positive diagonal, and the matrix is square, factorize, solve, and perform one refinement iteration using <small>UMFPACK</small>.
trans-unit.target: 如果稀疏的Cholesky因式分解失败或矩阵不是具有真实正对角线的Hermitian，并且矩阵为正方形，则使用<small>UMFPACK</small>进行因式分解，求解并执行一次优化迭代。

trans-unit.source: If the special parameter name varargin appears at the end of a function parameter list it indicates that the function takes a variable number of input arguments. Using varargin the function looks like this
trans-unit.target: 如果特殊参数名称 varargin 出现在函数参数列表的末尾，则表明函数采用了可变数量的输入参数。使用 varargin 函数看起来像这样

trans-unit.source: If the string format is not present or is equal to "short" then s will contain the abbreviated name of the weekday. If format is "long" then s will contain the full name.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串 format 不存在或等于 "short" 则 s 将包含工作日的缩写名称。如果 format 为 "long" 则 s 将包含全名。

trans-unit.source: If the string line_spec is given it is passed to plot and determines the appearance of the plot.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了字符串 line_spec ,则将其传递给 plot 并确定图的外观。

trans-unit.source: If the string argument "pp" is specified, then xi should not be supplied and interp1 returns a piecewise polynomial object. This object can later be used with ppval to evaluate the interpolation. There is an equivalence, such that ppval (interp1 (x, y, method, "pp"), xi) == interp1 (x, y, xi, method, "extrap").
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了字符串参数 "pp" ，则不应提供 xi ,并且 interp1 返回分段多项式对象。此对象以后可以与 ppval 一起使用以评估插值。存在一个等价关系，例如 ppval (interp1 (x, y, method, "pp"), xi) == interp1 (x, y, xi, method, "extrap") 。

trans-unit.source: If the syntax of a conversion specification is invalid, the behavior is undefined. If there aren’t enough function arguments provided to supply addresses for all the conversion specifications in the template strings that perform assignments, or if the arguments are not of the correct types, the behavior is also undefined. On the other hand, extra arguments are simply ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换规范的语法无效，则行为未定义。如果没有足够的函数参数为执行赋值的模板字符串中的所有转换规范提供地址，或者参数的类型不正确，则该行为也未定义。另一方面，多余的参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the syntax of a conversion specification is invalid, unpredictable things will happen, so don’t do this. In particular, <small>MATLAB</small> allows a bare percentage sign ‘
trans-unit.target: 如果转换规范的语法无效，则将发生不可预测的事情，因此请不要这样做。特别是，<small>MATLAB</small>允许使用百分号'

trans-unit.source: If the system is not square, or if the coefficient matrix is singular, a minimum norm solution is computed.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统不是正方形,或者系数矩阵是奇异的,则计算最小规范解。

trans-unit.source: If the table is decreasing, then the tests are reversed. For non-strictly monotonic tables, empty intervals are always skipped. The result is undefined if <var>table</var> is not monotonic, or if <var>table</var> contains a NaN.
trans-unit.target: 如果表格减少，则测试将被逆转。对于非严格单调表，总是跳过空间隔。如果 <var>table</var> 不是单调的，或者 <var>table</var> 包含NaN ，则结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: If the third argument "exact" is not given, then s only needs to match A up to the length of s. Trailing spaces and nulls in s and A are ignored when matching.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出第三个参数 "exact" ，则 s 仅需要匹配 A ,直到 s 的长度。匹配时将忽略 s 和 A 中的尾随空格和null 。

trans-unit.source: If the third optional argument "all" is supplied, return a cell array containing the list of all files that have the same name in the path. If no files are found, return an empty cell array.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了第三个可选参数 "all" ，则返回一个单元格数组，其中包含路径中具有相同名称的所有文件的列表。如果找不到文件，则返回一个空单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: If the user ID does not exist in the database, getpwuid returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库中不存在用户标识，则 getpwuid 返回0。

trans-unit.source: If the user name does not exist in the database, getpwname returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库中不存在该用户名，则 getpwname 返回0。

trans-unit.source: If the user preference to request confirmation before exiting, Octave will display a dialog and give the user an option to cancel the exit process.

If the values are cell arrays, create a structure array and initialize its values. The dimensions of each cell array of values must match. Singleton cells and non-cell values are repeated so that they fill the entire array. If the cells are empty, create an empty structure array with the specified field names.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是单元格数组,创建一个结构数组并初始化其值。每个单元格数组的值的尺寸必须匹配。单个单元格和非单元格的值是重复的,因此它们会填满整个数组。如果单元格为空,则用指定的字段名创建一个空结构数组。

trans-unit.source: If the vertices are matrices of size MxN then each polygon patch has M vertices and a total of N polygons will be created. If some polygons do not have M vertices use NaN to represent "no vertex". If the <var>z</var> input is present then 3-D patches will be created.

trans-unit.source: If the warning message does not end with a newline character, Octave will print a traceback of all the function calls leading to the warning. If the warning message does end in a newline character, Octave will suppress the traceback messages as it returns control to the top level. For more details and examples, see error.

trans-unit.target: 如果存在n个间隔，并且 pp 的维数为d，则所得数组的维数为 [d, n-1] 。

trans-unit.source: If there are no more characters to read, fgetl returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有更多的字符要读取，则 fgetl 返回-1。

trans-unit.source: If there are no more characters to read, fgets returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有更多的字符要读取，则 fgets 返回-1。

trans-unit.source: If there are not a perfect number <var>n</var> of regularly spaced colors then the remaining entries in the colormap are gradients of pure red, green, blue, and gray.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有理想数量的 <var>n</var> 个规则排列的颜色，则颜色图中的其余条目为纯红色，绿色，蓝色和灰色的渐变。

trans-unit.source: If there are three named outputs and opts.milu != "row", P is returned such that L and U are incomplete factors of P*A. When opts.milu == "row", P is returned such that L and U are incomplete factors of A*P.
trans-unit.target: 如果有三个命名输出，并且 opts .milu！= "row" ，则返回 P ，使得 L 和 U 是 P*A 的不完整因子。当 opts .milu == "row" ，返回 P ，使得 L 和 U 是 A*P 的不完全因子。

trans-unit.source: If there aren’t enough function arguments provided to supply values for all the conversion specifications in the template string, or if the arguments are not of the correct types, the results are unpredictable. If you supply more arguments than conversion specifications, the extra argument values are simply ignored; this is sometimes useful.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有足够的函数参数来提供模板字符串中所有转换规范的值，或者参数的类型不正确，则结果将不可预测。如果您提供的参数多于转换规范，那么多余的参数值将被忽略；这有时很有用。

trans-unit.source: If there is no such occurrence, or if pattern is longer than str, or if pattern itself is empty, then idx is the empty array [].
trans-unit.target: 如果没有发生这种情况，或者 pattern 的长度大于 str ，或者 pattern 本身为空，则 idx 为空数组 [] 。

trans-unit.source: If this auto-joining feature is not desired then it is important to call newplot first to prepare a new figure and axes for plotting. Alternatively, the easier way is to call a high-level graphics routine which will both create the plot and then populate it with low-level graphics objects. Instead of calling line, use plot. Or use surf instead of surface. Or use fill instead of patch.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要此自动连接功能，则必须首先调用 newplot 以准备用于绘制的新图形和轴，这一点很重要。另外，更简单的方法是调用高级图形例程，该例程将创建图，然后使用低级图形对象填充它。代替调用 line ，使用 plot 。或使用 surf 代替 surface 。或者使用 fill 代替 patch 。

trans-unit.target: 如果此文件存在于此，则其内容也将附加到 <var>static classpath</var> 。请注意，在此最后一步中定义的档案和类目录将影响所有用户。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set, the simplex solver uses the built-in LP presolver. Otherwise the LP presolver is not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个标志,单工求解器就会使用内置的LP预解器,否则不使用LP预解器。否则不使用LP预解器。

trans-unit.target: 如果这不是你想要的,请使用一系列的调用,而不是只有一个。

trans-unit.source: If this option is disabled, Octave will display the results produced by evaluating expressions within a function body that are not terminated with a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用该选项,Octave将显示在函数体中评估表达式产生的结果,这些表达式不以分号结尾。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set to a nonzero value, you must also set the "algebraic variables" option to declare which variables in the problem are algebraic.
trans-unit.target: 如果此选项设置为非零值，则还必须设置 "algebraic variables" 选项，以声明问题中哪些变量是代数的。

trans-unit.target: 如果该参数为非零,则将问题的副本以CPLEX LP格式保存到文件中。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to "auto", facenormals are automatically calculated if the edgelighting or facelighting property are set to "flat" and at least one light object is present and visible in the same axes.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性被设置为 "auto" ， facenormals 如果自动计算 edgelighting 或 facelighting 属性被设置为 "flat" 和至少一个 light 对象处于同一轴线本和可见的。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to "auto", vertexnormals are automatically calculated if the edgelighting or facelighting property are set to "gouraud" and at least one light object is present and visible in the same axes.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性被设置为 "auto" ， vertexnormals 如果自动计算 edgelighting 或 facelighting 属性被设置为 "gouraud" 和至少一个 light 对象处于同一轴线本和可见的。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a nonzero scalar, then amd performs aggressive absorption. The default is not to perform aggressive absorption.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为非零标量，则 amd 会执行主动吸收。默认设置为不执行主动吸收。

trans-unit.source: If three functions are passed, then plot the parametrically defined function [fx(s, t), fy(s, t), fz(s, t)].
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了三个函数，则绘制参数定义的函数 [fx(s, t), fy(s, t), fz(s, t)] 。

trans-unit.source: If three inputs are given, direction should be one of "first" or "last", requesting only the first or last n indices, respectively. However, the indices are always returned in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了三个输入，则 direction 应该是 "first" 或 "last" ，分别仅请求前 n 个索引或后n个索引。但是，索引始终以升序返回。

trans-unit.source: If tolerances are left unspecified, and any integration limits or waypoints are of type single, then Octave’s integral functions automatically reduce the default absolute and relative error tolerances as specified above. If tighter tolerances are desired they must be specified. MATLAB leaves the tighter tolerances appropriate for double inputs in place regardless of the class of the integration limits.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定公差，并且任何积分限制或航点均为 single 类型，则Octave的积分函数会自动减小上述指定的默认绝对误差和相对误差。如果需要更严格的公差，则必须指定公差。无论积分极限的等级如何，MATLAB都会保留适合 double 输入的更严格的公差。

trans-unit.source: If true, values of struct array elements are printed. This variable does not affect scalar structures whose elements are always printed. In both cases, however, printing will be limited to the number of levels specified by <var>struct_levels_to_print</var>.

trans-unit.target: 如果传递两个函数作为输入,那么参数化函数

trans-unit.source: If two inputs and two outputs are given, return the derivative of the polynomial quotient b/a. The quotient numerator is in q and the denominator in d.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出两个输入和两个输出，则返回多项式商 b / a 的导数。商分子在 q 中，分母在 d 中。

trans-unit.source: If two inputs are given, <var>n</var> indicates the maximum number of elements to find from the beginning of the matrix or vector.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出两个输入，则 <var>n</var> 表示从矩阵或向量的开头查找的最大元素数。

trans-unit.source: If two output arguments are requested pkg splits the list of installed packages into those which were installed by the current user, and those which were installed by the system administrator.

trans-unit.source: Implementation Details:
trans-unit.target: 执行细节:

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: close operates by making the handle h the current figure, and then calling the function specified by the "closerequestfcn" property of the figure. By default, the function closereq is used. It is possible that the function invoked will delay or abort removing the figure. To remove a figure without executing any callback functions use delete. When writing a callback function to close a window do not use close to avoid recursion.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意： close 通过将句柄 h 作为当前图形，然后调用图形的 "closerequestfcn" 属性指定的函数来进行操作。默认情况下，使用 closereq 函数。调用的函数可能会延迟或中止删除图形。要删除图形而不执行任何回调函数，请使用 delete 。编写回调函数以关闭窗口时，请勿使用 close 以避免递归。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: ginput is intenteded for 2-D plots. For 3-D plots see the currentpoint property of the current axes which can be transformed with knowledge of the current view into data units.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意： ginput 适用于二维绘图。对于3-D图，请参见当前轴的 currentpoint 属性，可以将其与当前 view 知识一起转换为数据单位。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: randi relies internally on rand which uses class "double" to represent numbers. This limits the maximum integer (imax) and range (imax - imin) to the value returned by the flintmax function. For IEEE floating point numbers this value is 2^{53} - 1.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意： randi 内部依赖于 rand ，它使用类 "double" 表示数字。这将最大整数（ imax ）和范围（ imax - imin ）限制为 flintmax 函数返回的值。对于IEEE浮点数，此值为2 ^ {53}-1。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: A colorbar is created as an additional axes object with the "tag" property set to "colorbar". The created object has the extra property "location" which controls the positioning of the colorbar.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意：创建颜色栏作为附加轴对象，并且将 "tag" 属性设置为 "colorbar" 。创建的对象具有额外的属性 "location" ，该属性控制颜色栏的位置。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: Color definitions with RGB-triples are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 实施说明:带有RGB三原色的颜色定义是无效的。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: For Octave versions ≤ 4.2, quadcc accepted a single tolerance argument which specified the relative tolerance. For versions 4.4 and 5, quadcc will issue a warning when called with a single tolerance argument indicating that the meaning of this input has changed from relative tolerance to absolute tolerance. The warning ID for this message is "Octave:quadcc:RelTol-conversion". The warning may be disabled with warning ("off", "Octave:quadcc:RelTol-conversion").
trans-unit.target: 实施注意：对于 quadcc Octave版本，quadcc接受了指定相对公差的单个公差参数。对于4.4和5版本， quadcc 在使用单个公差参数调用时将发出警告，指示此输入的含义已从相对公差更改为绝对公差。该消息的警告ID为 "Octave:quadcc:RelTol-conversion" 。可以通过警告禁用 warning ("off", "Octave:quadcc:RelTol-conversion") 。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: For compatibility with MATLAB, escape sequences in pat (e.g., "\n" => newline) are expanded even when pat has been defined with single quotes. To disable expansion use a second backslash before the escape sequence (e.g., "\\n") or use the regexptranslate function.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意：为了与MATLAB兼容，即使使用单引号定义了 pat ， pat 中的转义序列（例如 "\n" => newline）也将被扩展。要禁用扩展，请在转义序列之前使用第二个反斜杠（例如“ \\ n”）或使用 regexptranslate 函数。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: For compatibility with MATLAB, escape sequences in template (e.g., "\n" => newline) are processed regardless of whether template has been defined with single quotes, as long as there are two or more input arguments. To disable escape sequence expansion use a second backslash before the sequence (e.g., "\\n") or use the regexptranslate function.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意：为了与MATLAB兼容，只要有两个或多个输入参数，无论 template 是否已用单引号定义，都将处理 template 转义序列（例如， "\n" =>换行符）。要禁用转义序列扩展，请在序列之前使用第二个反斜杠（例如 "\\n" ）或使用 regexptranslate 函数。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: For compatibility with MATLAB, escape sequences in the template string (e.g., "\n" => newline) are expanded even when the template string is defined with single quotes.
trans-unit.target: 实现注意：为了与MATLAB兼容，即使使用单引号定义了模板字符串，模板字符串中的转义序列（例如， "\n" =>换行符）也将被扩展。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: If script includes a path component, then run first changes the working directory to the directory where script is found. Next, the script is executed. Finally, run returns to the original working directory unlessscript has specifically changed directories.

Implementation Note: If script includes a path component, then run first changes the working directory to the directory where script is found. Next, the script is executed. Finally, run returns to the original working directory unless script has specifically changed directories.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意：如果 script 包括路径组件，则首先 run 将工作目录更改为找到 script 的目录。接下来，执行脚本。最后，除非 script 专门更改了目录，否则 run 将返回到原始工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: Strings are first converted to double values before the checks for valid indices are made. Unless a string contains the NULL character "\0", it will always be a valid index.
trans-unit.target: 实施说明:在检查有效索引之前,字符串首先被转换为双值。除非一个字符串包含NULL字符"\0",否则它将始终是一个有效的索引。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: The grayscale intensity is calculated as
trans-unit.target: 实施说明:灰度强度的计算方法为

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: The input q must be less than flintmax (9.0072e+15) in order to factor correctly.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意：为了正确 flintmax ，输入 q 必须小于flintmax（9.0072e + 15）。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: The legend label text is either provided in the call to legend or is taken from the DisplayName property of the graphics objects. Only data objects, such as line, patch, and surface, have this property whereas axes, figures, etc. do not so they are never present in a legend. If no labels or DisplayName properties are available, then the label text is simply "data1", "data2", …, "dataN".

Implementation Note: The legend label text is either provided in the call to legend or is taken from the DisplayName property of the graphics objects. Only data objects, such as line, patch, and surface, have this property whereas axes, figures, etc. do not so they are never present in a legend. If no labels or DisplayName properties are available, then the label text is simply "data1", "data2", …, "dataN". No more than 20 data labels will be automatically generated. To label more, call legend explicitly and provide all labels.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意：图例标签文本可以在 legend 调用中提供，也可以从图形对象的 DisplayName 属性获取。只有数据对象（例如线，面和曲面）才具有此属性，而轴，图形等则没有，因此它们永远不会出现在图例中。如果没有标签或 DisplayName 属性可用，则标签文本就是 "data1" ， "data2" ，...， "dataN" 。自动生成的数据标签不会超过20个。要标记更多标签，请显式调用 legend 并提供所有标签。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: The origin (0, 0) for images is located in the upper left. For ordinary plots, the origin is located in the lower left. Octave handles this inversion by plotting the data normally, and then reversing the direction of the y-axis by setting the ydir property to "reverse". This has implications whenever an image and an ordinary plot need to be overlaid. The recommended solution is to display the image and then plot the reversed ydata using, for example, flipud (ydata).
trans-unit.target: 实施注意：图像的原点（0，0）位于左上方。对于普通图，原点位于左下方。 Octave通过正常绘制数据来处理这种反转，然后通过将 ydir 属性设置为 "reverse" 来反转 y轴的方向。每当需要覆盖图像和普通图时，这都会产生影响。推荐的解决方案是显示图像，然后使用例如 flipud (ydata) 绘制反转的ydata 。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: The polar axis is drawn using line and text objects encapsulated in an hggroup. The hggroup properties are linked to the original axes object such that altering an appearance property, for example fontname, will update the polar axis. Two new properties are added to the original axes–rtick, ttick–which replace xtick, ytick. The first is a list of tick locations in the radial (rho) direction; The second is a list of tick locations in the angular (theta) direction specified in degrees, i.e., in the range 0–359.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意：极轴是使用封装在hggroup中的线和文本对象绘制的。 hggroup属性链接到原始轴对象，以便更改外观属性（例如 fontname ）将更新极轴。两个新的属性添加到原axes- rtick ， ttick 哪位更换 xtick ， ytick 。第一个是径向（rho）方向上的刻度位置列表；第二个是在以度数指定的角（θ）方向上的刻度位置列表，即范围为0–359。

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: The search only includes objects with visible handles (HandleVisibility = "on"). See findall, to search for all objects including hidden ones.

trans-unit.source: In Octave, unlike Fortran, function arguments are passed by value, which means that each argument in a function call is evaluated and assigned to a temporary location in memory before being passed to the function. trans-unit.source: In a thermal model, we want to calculate the temperature in Omega and know the boundary temperature (Dirichlet condition) or heat flux (from which we can calculate the Neumann condition by dividing by the thermal conductivity at the boundary). Similarly, in an electrical model, we want to calculate the voltage in Omega and know the boundary voltage (Dirichlet) or current (Neumann condition after diving by the electrical conductivity). In an electrical model, it is common for much of the boundary to be electrically isolated; this is a Neumann boundary condition with the current equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 在热模型中,我们想计算Omega中的温度,并知道边界温度(Dirichlet条件)或热通量(从中我们可以通过除以边界的热导率来计算诺伊曼条件)。同样,在电学模型中,我们想在Omega中计算电压,并知道边界电压(Dirichlet)或电流(通过电导率下潜后的诺伊曼条件)。在电学模型中,边界的大部分区域通常是电隔离的,这就是电流等于零的诺依曼边界条件。

trans-unit.source: In general Octave supports four different kinds of images, grayscale images, RGB images, binary images, and indexed images. A grayscale image is represented with an M-by-N matrix in which each element corresponds to the intensity of a pixel. An RGB image is represented with an M-by-N-by-3 array where each 3-vector corresponds to the red, green, and blue intensities of each pixel.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,Octave支持四种不同的图像,灰度图像、RGB图像、二进制图像和索引图像。灰度图像用一个M乘N的矩阵表示,其中每个元素对应一个像素的强度。RGB图像用M-by-N-by-3阵列表示,其中每个3个向量对应于每个像素的红、绿、蓝强度。

trans-unit.source: In general any function or operator used on a sparse matrix will result in a sparse matrix with the same or a larger number of nonzero elements than the original matrix. This is particularly true for the important case of sparse matrix factorizations. The usual way to address this is to reorder the matrix, such that its factorization is sparser than the factorization of the original matrix. That is the factorization of L * U = P * S * Q has sparser terms L and U than the equivalent factorization L * U = S.
trans-unit.target: 通常，在稀疏矩阵上使用的任何函数或运算符都将导致稀疏矩阵具有比原始矩阵相同或更多数量的非零元素。对于稀疏矩阵分解的重要情况尤其如此。解决此问题的通常方法是对矩阵重新排序，以使其分解比原始矩阵的分解稀疏。也就是说的因式分解 L * U = P * S * Q 具有稀疏术语 L 和 U 比等效因式分解 L * U = S 。

trans-unit.source: In general it is best to avoid calculating the inverse of a matrix directly. For example, it is both faster and more accurate to solve systems of equations (A*x = b) with y = A \ b, rather than y = inv (A) * b.
trans-unit.target: 通常，最好避免直接计算矩阵的逆。例如，用 y = A \ b = A \ b而不是 y = inv (A) * b = inv（ A ）* b求解方程组（ A * x = b）既更快又准确。

trans-unit.source: In general there are only three points on the circumference of any circum-circle. However, in some cases, and in particular for the case of a regular grid, 4 or more points can be on a single circum-circle. In this case the Delaunay triangulation is not unique.
trans-unit.target: 在一般情况下,任何圆周上只有三个点。然而,在某些情况下,特别是对于规则网格的情况下,一个圆周上可以有4个或更多的点。在这种情况下,Delaunay三角法不是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: In general there may be no way of knowing the best distribution of points ahead of time. Or the points may come from an experiment where there is no freedom to select the best distribution. In any case, one must remain aware of this issue when using trapz.
trans-unit.target: 通常，可能无法提前知道点的最佳分布。或者这些问题可能来自没有自由选择最佳分布的实验。在任何情况下，使用 trapz 时都必须意识到这一问题。

trans-unit.source: In general, the first argument in a method definition is always the object that it is called from. trans-unit.source: In order to motivate this application, we consider the boundary value Laplace equation. This system can model scalar potential fields, such as heat or electrical potential. Given a medium Omega with boundary dOmega. At all points on the dOmega the boundary conditions are known, and we wish to calculate the potential in Omega. Boundary conditions may specify the potential (Dirichlet boundary condition), its normal derivative across the boundary (Neumann boundary condition), or a weighted sum of the potential and its derivative (Cauchy boundary condition).
trans-unit.target: 为了激励这一应用,我们考虑边界值拉普拉斯方程。这个系统可以模拟标量势场,如热或电动势。给定一个边界为dOmega的介质Omega。在dOmega上的所有点,边界条件是已知的,我们希望计算Omega中的电势。边界条件可以指定电位(Dirichlet边界条件),它在边界上的法向导数(Neumann边界条件),或电位及其导数的加权和(Cauchy边界条件)。

trans-unit.source: In the first form, the word consists of the longest run consisting of only characters between the brackets. Ranges of characters can be specified by a hyphen; for example, %[0-9a-zA-Z] matches all alphanumeric characters (if the underlying character set is ASCII). Since MATLAB treats hyphens literally, this expansion only applies to alphanumeric characters. To include ’-’ in the set, it should appear first or last in the brackets; to include ’]’, it should be the first character. If the first character is ’^’ then the word consists of characters not listed.
trans-unit.target: 在第一种形式中，单词由最长的单词组成，仅由方括号之间的字符组成。字符范围可以用连字符指定；例如，％[0-9a-zA-Z]匹配所有字母数字字符（如果基础字符集是ASCII）。由于MATLAB按字面意义处理连字符，因此这种扩展仅适用于字母数字字符。要在集合中包含“-”，则应在括号中显示第一个或最后一个；要包含']'，则应为第一个字符。如果第一个字符为“ ^”，则该单词由未列出的字符组成。

trans-unit.source: Instead of specifying polygons by matrices x and y, it is possible to present a unique list of vertices and then a list of polygon faces created from those vertices. In this case the "Vertices" matrix will be an Nx2 (2-D patch) or Nx3 (3-D patch). The MxN "Faces" matrix describes M polygons having N vertices—each row describes a single polygon and each column entry is an index into the "Vertices" matrix to identify a vertex. The patch object can be created by directly passing the property/value pairs "Vertices"/verts, "Faces"/faces as inputs.
trans-unit.target: 代替通过矩阵 x 和 y 指定多边形，可以呈现一个唯一的顶点列表，然后呈现一个由这些顶点创建的多边形面的列表。在这种情况下， "Vertices" 矩阵将是Nx2（2-D补丁）或Nx3（3-D补丁）。 MxN "Faces" 矩阵描述了具有N个顶点的M个多边形-每行描述一个多边形，每个列条目都是 "Vertices" 矩阵的索引以标识一个顶点。可以通过直接传递属性/值对 "Vertices" / verts ， "Faces" / faces 作为输入来创建补丁对象。

trans-unit.source: Interpolate input data to determine the value of yi at the points xi. If not specified, x is taken to be the indices of y (1:length (y)). If y is a matrix or an N-dimensional array, the interpolation is performed on each column of y.
trans-unit.target: 对输入数据进行插值以确定点 xi 上的 yi 值。如果未指定，则将 x 视为 y 的索引（ 1:length (y) y ））。如果 y 是矩阵或N维数组，则对 y 的每一列执行插值。

trans-unit.source: Interpolate reference data x, y, z to determine zi at the coordinates xi, yi. The reference data x, y can be matrices, as returned by meshgrid, in which case the sizes of x, y, and z must be equal. If x, y are vectors describing a grid then length (x) == columns (z) and length (y) == rows (z). In either case the input data must be strictly monotonic.
trans-unit.target: 对参考数据 x ， y ， z 进行插值，以在 xi ， yi 坐标处确定 zi 。参考数据 x ， y 可以是由 meshgrid 返回的矩阵，在这种情况下， x ， y 和 z 的大小必须相等。如果 x ， y 是描述网格的矢量，则 length (x) == columns (z) x ）==列（ z ）和 length (y) == rows (z) y ）==行（ z ）。无论哪种情况，输入数据都必须严格单调。

trans-unit.source: Interpolate reference data x, y, z, v to determine vi at the coordinates xi, yi, zi. The reference data x, y, z can be matrices, as returned by meshgrid, in which case the sizes of x, y, z, and v must be equal. If x, y, z are vectors describing a cubic grid then length (x) == columns (v), length (y) == rows (v), and length (z) == size (v, 3). In either case the input data must be strictly monotonic.
trans-unit.target: 对参考数据 x ， y ， z ， v 进行插值，以在 xi ， yi ， zi 坐标处确定 vi 。参考数据 x ， y ， z 可以是由 meshgrid 返回的矩阵，在这种情况下， x ， y ， z 和 v 的大小必须相等。如果 x ， y ， z 是描述立方网格的矢量，则 length (x) == columns (v) x ）==列（ v ）， length (y) == rows (v) 和 length (z) == size (v, 3) 。无论哪种情况，输入数据都必须严格单调。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to assign an identification string to a warning. If a warning has such an ID the user can enable and disable this warning as will be described in the next section. To assign an ID to a warning, simply call warning with two string arguments, where the first is the identification string, and the second is the actual warning. Note that warning IDs are in the format "NAMESPACE:WARNING-NAME". The namespace "Octave" is used for Octave’s own warnings. Any other string is available as a namespace for user’s own warnings.
trans-unit.target: 也可以将标识字符串分配给警告。如果警告具有这样的ID，则用户可以启用和禁用此警告，如以下部分所述。要将ID分配给警告，只需使用两个字符串参数调用 warning ，其中第一个是标识字符串，第二个是实际警告。请注意，警告ID的格式为 "NAMESPACE:WARNING-NAME" 。名称空间 "Octave" 用于八度自身的警告。任何其他字符串都可以用作用户自己的警告的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to assign an identification string to an error. If an error has such an ID the user can catch this error as will be described in the next section. To assign an ID to an error, simply call error with two string arguments, where the first is the identification string, and the second is the actual error. Note that error IDs are in the format "NAMESPACE:ERROR-NAME". The namespace "Octave" is used for Octave’s own errors. Any other string is available as a namespace for user’s own errors.
trans-unit.target: 也可以将标识字符串分配给错误。如果错误具有这样的ID，则用户可以捕获此错误，如下一节所述。要将ID分配给错误，只需使用两个字符串参数调用 error ，其中第一个是标识字符串，第二个是实际错误。请注意，错误ID的格式为 "NAMESPACE:ERROR-NAME" 。名称空间 "Octave" 用于八度自身的错误。任何其他字符串都可以用作用户自身错误的名称空间。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to define new specialized data types by writing a small amount of C++ code. On some systems, new data types can be loaded dynamically while Octave is running, so it is not necessary to recompile all of Octave just to add a new type. See External Code Interface, for more information about Octave’s dynamic linking capabilities. User-defined Data Types describes what you must do to define a new data type for Octave.
trans-unit.target: 通过编写少量的C ++代码，也可以定义新的专用数据类型。在某些系统上，新数据类型可以在Octave运行时动态加载，因此不必重新编译所有Octave即可添加新类型。有关Octave动态链接功能的更多信息，请参见外部代码接口。用户定义的数据类型描述了必须为Octave定义新数据类型的操作。

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that a file format is not actually defined by its file extension and that GraphicsMagick is capable to read and write more file formats than the ones listed by imformats. What this means is that even with an incorrect or missing extension the image may still be read correctly, and that even unlisted formats are not necessarily unsupported.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要注意，文件格式实际上不是由文件扩展名定义的，并且 GraphicsMagick 能够读取和写入的文件格式要比 imformats 列出的更多。这意味着即使扩展名不正确或丢失，也可以正确读取图像，甚至未列出的格式也不一定不受支持。

trans-unit.source: It is important to understand the implications that this optimization brings. Since no extra copy of x will exist in the caller’s scope, it is solely the callee’s responsibility to not leave x in an invalid state if an error occurs during the execution. Also, if the method partially changes x and then errors out, the changes will affect x in the caller’s scope. Deleting or completely replacing x inside subsasgn will not do anything, however, only indexed assignments matter.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要了解此优化带来的影响。由于没有多余的副本 x 将在调用者的范围存在，它是完全被叫方的责任，不留 x ，如果在执行过程中出现错误无效状态。同样，如果该方法部分更改 x ，然后出错，则更改将影响调用者范围内的 x 。在subsasgn中删除或完全替换 x 不会做任何事情，但是，只有索引分配很重要。

trans-unit.source: It is often necessary to find if two strings or files are identical. This might be done by comparing them character by character and looking for differences. However, this can be slow, and so comparing a hash of the string or file can be a rapid way of finding if the files differ.
trans-unit.target: 通常需要查找两个字符串或文件是否相同。这可能是通过逐个字符比较它们并寻找差异来实现的。然而,这样做的速度可能很慢,因此比较字符串或文件的哈希值可以快速找到文件是否不同。

trans-unit.source: It is often necessary to identify whether a particular point in the N-dimensional space is within the Delaunay tessellation of a set of points in this N-dimensional space, and if so which N-simplex contains the point and which point in the tessellation is closest to the desired point. The functions tsearch and dsearch perform this function in a triangulation, and tsearchn and dsearchn in an N-dimensional tessellation.
trans-unit.target: 通常需要确定N维空间中的特定点是否在该N维空间中的一组点的Delaunay细分中，如果是，则哪个N-单形包含该点，而细分中的哪个点是最接近所需点。函数 tsearch 和 dsearch 在三角剖分中执行此功能，而 tsearchn 和 dsearchn 在N维细分中执行此功能。

trans-unit.source: It is often useful to calculate descriptive statistics over a subsection (i.e., window) of a full dataset. Octave provides the function movfun which will call an arbitrary function handle with windows of data and accumulate the results. Many of the most commonly desired functions, such as the moving average over a window of data (movmean), are already provided.
trans-unit.target: 在整个数据集的一个子部分（即窗口）上计算描述性统计信息通常很有用。Octave提供了 movfun 函数，该函数将使用数据窗口调用任意函数句柄并累积结果。已经提供了许多最常用的功能，例如数据窗口上的移动平均值（ movmean ）。

trans-unit.source: It is worth re-iterating that, if only built-in functions are to be called from a C++ standalone program then it does not need to initialize the interpreter. The general rule is that for a built-in function named function_name in the interpreter, there will be a C++ function named Ffunction_name (note the prepended capital F) accessible in the C++ API. The declarations for all built-in functions are collected in the header file builtin-defun-decls.h. This feature should be used with care as the list of built-in functions can change. No guarantees can be made that a function that is currently a built-in won’t be implemented as a

It is worth re-iterating that, if only built-in functions are to be called from a C++ standalone program then it does not need to initialize the interpreter. The general rule is that for a built-in function named function_name in the interpreter, there will be a C++ function named Ffunction_name (note the prepended capital F) accessible in the C++ API. The declarations for all built-in functions are collected in the header file builtin-defun-decls.h. This feature should be used with care as the list of built-in functions can change. No guarantees can be made that a function that is currently a built-in won’t be implemented as a .m file or as a dynamically linked function in the future. An example of how to call built-in functions from C++ can be seen in the code
trans-unit.target: 值得重申的是，如果仅从C ++独立程序中调用内置函数，则不需要初始化解释器。一般规则是，对于解释器中名为 function_name 的内置函数，将在C ++ API中访问一个名为 Ffunction_name 的C ++函数（请注意前缀大写的 F ）。所有内置函数的声明都收集在头文件 builtin-defun-decls.h 。应谨慎使用此功能，因为内置功能列表可能会更改。无法保证当前内置的函数将来不会实现为.m文件或​​动态链接函数。在代码中可以看到如何从C ++调用内置函数的示例

trans-unit.source: It outputs an indexed image <var>x</var> and a colormap <var>map</var> to interpret an image exactly the same as the input. No dithering or other form of color quantization is performed. The output class of the indexed image <var>x</var> can be uint8, uint16 or double, whichever is required to specify the number of unique colors in the image (which will be equal to the number of rows in <var>map</var>) in order.
trans-unit.target: 它输出一个索引图像 <var>x</var> 和一个色 <var>map</var> 以解释与输入完全相同的图像。不执行抖动或其他形式的颜色量化。索引图像 <var>x</var> 的输出类可以是uint8，uint16或double，以顺序指定图像中唯一颜色的数量（将等于 <var>map</var> 中的行数）。

trans-unit.source: It should be noted that the test for whether a matrix is a candidate for Cholesky factorization, performed above, and by the matrix_type function, does not make certain that the matrix is Hermitian. However, the attempt to factorize the matrix will quickly detect a non-Hermitian matrix.
trans-unit.target: 应该注意的是，上面通过 matrix_type 函数对矩阵是否适合进行Cholesky分解的测试并不能确定矩阵是否为Hermitian。但是，尝试对矩阵进行因子分解将快速检测到非Hermitian矩阵。

trans-unit.source: It should be noted, that due to the way that the Octave assignment functions are written that the assignment will reallocate the memory used by the sparse matrix at each iteration of the above loop. Therefore the spalloc function ignores the nz argument and does not pre-assign the memory for the matrix. Therefore, it is vitally important that code using to above structure should be vectorized as much as possible to minimize the number of assignments and reduce the number of memory allocations.
trans-unit.target: 应该注意的是，由于八度赋值函数的编写方式，该赋值将在上述循环的每次迭代中重新分配稀疏矩阵使用的内存。因此，spalloc函数将忽略 nz 参数，并且不会为矩阵预先分配内存。因此，至关重要的是，应将用于上述结构的代码尽可能地向量化，以最大程度减少分配数量并减少内存分配数量。

trans-unit.source: Known MATLAB incompatibility: If tolerances are left unspecified, and any integration limits are of type single, then Octave’s integral functions automatically reduce the default absolute and relative error tolerances as specified above. If tighter tolerances are desired they must be specified. MATLAB leaves the tighter tolerances appropriate for double inputs in place regardless of the class of the integration limits.
trans-unit.target: 已知的MATLAB不兼容性：如果未指定公差，并且任何积分极限均为 single 类型，则Octave的积分函数会自动减小上述指定的默认绝对误差和相对误差。如果需要更严格的公差，则必须指定公差。无论积分极限的等级如何，MATLAB都会保留适合 double 输入的更严格的公差。

trans-unit.source: Like an error, a warning is issued when something unexpected happens. Unlike an error, a warning doesn’t abort the currently running program. A simple example of a warning is when a number is divided by zero. In this case Octave will issue a warning and assign the value Inf to the result.
trans-unit.target: 像错误一样，当发生意外情况时会发出警告。与错误不同，警告不会中止当前正在运行的程序。一个简单的警告示例是将数字除以零。在这种情况下，Octave将发出警告并为结果分配值 Inf 。

trans-unit.source: Like comparison operations, each element of an element-by-element boolean expression also has a numeric value (1 if true, 0 if false) that comes into play if the result of the boolean expression is stored in a variable, or used in arithmetic.
trans-unit.target: 和比较操作一样,逐个元素的布尔表达式的每个元素也有一个数值(如果为真则为1,如果为假则为0),如果将布尔表达式的结果存储在一个变量中,或者用于运算,这个数值就会发挥作用。

trans-unit.source: Like every other expression, the function call has a value, which is computed by the function based on the arguments you give it. In this example, the value of sqrt (argument) is the square root of the argument. A function can also have side effects, such as assigning the values of certain variables or doing input or output operations.
trans-unit.target: 像其他所有表达式一样，函数调用具有一个值，该值由函数根据您为其提供的参数进行计算。在此示例中， sqrt (argument) 的值是参数的平方根。函数也可能有副作用，例如分配某些变量的值或进行输入或输出操作。

trans-unit.source: Many Octave functions have been overloaded to work with either sparse or full matrices. There is no difference in calling convention when using an overloaded function with a sparse matrix, however, there is also no access to potentially sparse-specific features. At any time the sparse matrix specific version of a function can be used by explicitly calling its function name.

trans-unit.source: Mathematically, an identity matrix is both diagonal and permutation matrix. In Octave, eye (n) returns a diagonal matrix, because a matrix can only have one class. You can convert this diagonal matrix to a permutation matrix by indexing it by an identity permutation, as shown below. This is a special property of the identity matrix; indexing other diagonal matrices generally produces a full matrix.
trans-unit.target: 在数学上，恒等矩阵既是对角矩阵又是置换矩阵。在八度中， eye (n) 返回对角矩阵，因为矩阵只能具有一个类别。您可以通过对等矩阵进行索引来将对角矩阵转换为置换矩阵，如下所示。这是单位矩阵的一个特殊属性。索引其他对角矩阵通常会产生一个完整的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Matrix [xf, yf, zf; xb, yb, zb] which holds the coordinates (in axes data units) of the point over which the mouse pointer was when the mouse button was pressed. If a mouse callback function is defined, currentpoint holds the pointer coordinates at the time the mouse button was pressed. For 3-D plots, the first row of the returned matrix specifies the point nearest to the current camera position and the second row the furthest point. The two points forms a line which is perpendicular to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 矩阵 [xf, yf, zf; xb, yb, zb] ，保存按下鼠标按钮时鼠标指针所经过的点的坐标（以轴数据为单位）。如果定义了鼠标回调函数，则 currentpoint 保留按下鼠标按钮时的指针坐标。对于3-D图，返回矩阵的第一行指定最接近当前摄像机位置的点，第二行指定最远的点。这两个点形成一条垂直于屏幕的线。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Method 1: Inverse of empirical distribution function.
trans-unit.target: 方法一:经验分布函数的反。

trans-unit.source: Method 2: Similar to method 1 but with averaging at discontinuities.
trans-unit.target: 方法2:与方法1相似,但在不连续处进行平均。

trans-unit.source: Method 3: SAS definition: nearest even order statistic.
trans-unit.target: 方法3:SAS定义:最接近的偶数顺序统计。

trans-unit.source: Method 4: p(k) = k / N. That is, linear interpolation of the empirical cdf, where N is the length of P.
trans-unit.target: 方法4： p （k）= k /N。即，经验cdf的线性内插，其中N是 P 的长度。

trans-unit.source: Method 5: <var>p</var>(k) = (k - 0.5) / N. That is, a piecewise linear function where the knots are the values midway through the steps of the empirical cdf.
trans-unit.target: 方法5： <var>p</var> （k）=（k-0.5）/N。即，分段线性函数，其中结是经验cdf步骤中途的值。

trans-unit.source: Method 6: <var>p</var>(k) = k / (N + 1).
trans-unit.target: 方法6： <var>p</var> （k）= k /（N +1）。

trans-unit.source: Method 7: <var>p</var>(k) = (k - 1) / (N - 1).
Method 8: <var>p</var>(k) = (k - 1/3) / (N + 1/3). The resulting quantile estimates are approximately median-unbiased regardless of the distribution of <var>x</var>.
trans-unit.target: 方法8： <var>p</var> （k）=（k-1/3）/（N + 1/3）。无论 <var>x</var> 的分布如何，所得的分位数估计值近似为中值无偏的。

trans-unit.source: Method 9: <var>p</var>(k) = (k - 3/8) / (N + 1/4). The resulting quantile estimates are approximately unbiased for the expected order statistics if <var>x</var> is normally distributed.
trans-unit.target: 方法9： <var>p</var> （k）=（k-3/8）/（N + 1/4）。如果 <var>x</var> 正态分布，则所得的分位数估计对于预期的订单统计量几乎是无偏的。

trans-unit.source: Methods are defined by m-files in the class directory and can have embedded documentation the same as any other m-file. The help for the constructor can be obtained by using the constructor name alone, that is, for the polynomial constructor help polynomial will return the help string. Help can be restricted to a particular class by using the class directory name followed by the method. For example, help @polynomial/polynomial is another way of displaying the help string for the polynomial constructor. This second means is the only way to obtain help for the overloaded methods and functions of a class.
trans-unit.target: 方法由类目录中的m文件定义，并且可以具有与任何其他m文件相同的嵌入式文档。可以仅通过使用构造函数名称来获得构造函数的 help polynomial ，即对于多项式构造函数help多项式将返回帮助字符串。通过使用类目录名称后跟方法，可以将帮助限制为特定的类。例如， help @polynomial/polynomial 是显示多项式构造函数帮助字符串的另一种方法。第二种方法是获得有关类的重载方法和功能的帮助的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: More precisely, eps is the relative spacing between any two adjacent numbers in the machine’s floating point system. This number is obviously system dependent. On machines that support IEEE floating point arithmetic, eps is approximately 2.2204e-16 for double precision and 1.1921e-07 for single precision.
trans-unit.target: 更准确地说， eps 是机器浮点系统中任意两个相邻数字之间的相对间距。这个数字显然取决于系统。在支持IEEE浮点算术的机器上，双精度的 eps 约为2.2204e-16，单精度的eps约为1.1921e-07。

trans-unit.source: Most indexing expressions do not live longer than their parent objects. In rare cases, however, a lazily copied slice outlasts its parent, in which case it becomes orphaned, still occupying unnecessarily more memory than needed. To provide a remedy working in most real cases, Octave checks for orphaned lazy slices at certain situations, when a value is stored into a "permanent" location, such as a named variable or cell or struct element, and possibly economizes them. For example:
trans-unit.target: 大多数索引表达式的寿命不会比它们的父对象长。然而,在极少数情况下,一个懒惰复制的片断会比它的父对象寿命长,在这种情况下,它就会变成孤儿,仍然会不必要地占用更多的内存。为了提供一个在大多数实际情况下有效的补救措施,Octave在某些情况下检查是否有孤儿懒惰片,当一个值被存储到一个 "永久 "的位置,如一个命名的变量或单元格或结构元素,并可能会节省它们。比如说

trans-unit.source: Most operators (addition, concatenation, and so on) have no effect except to compute a value. If you ignore the value, you might as well not use the operator. An assignment operator is different. It does produce a value, but even if you ignore the value, the assignment still makes itself felt through the alteration of the variable. We call this a side effect.
trans-unit.target: 大多数运算符（加法，串联等）除计算值外没有其他作用。如果忽略该值，则可能不使用该运算符。赋值运算符是不同的。它的确会产生一个值，但是即使您忽略该值，该赋值仍然可以通过更改变量来感受到。我们称这为副作用。

Multiplication and division by diagonal matrices work efficiently also when combined with sparse matrices, i.e., D*S, where D is a diagonal matrix and S is a sparse matrix scales the rows of the sparse matrix and returns a sparse matrix. The expressions S*D, D\S, S/D work analogically.
trans-unit.target: 当与稀疏矩阵（即 D*S )组合使用时，对角矩阵的乘法和除法也有效地工作，其中 D 为对角矩阵， S 为稀疏矩阵缩放稀疏矩阵的行并返回稀疏矩阵。表达式 S*D ， D\S ， S/D 类似地工作。

trans-unit.source: Multiplication and division by permutation matrices works efficiently also when combined with sparse matrices, i.e., P*S, where P is a permutation matrix and S is a sparse matrix permutes the rows of the sparse matrix and returns a sparse matrix. The expressions S*P, P\S, S/P work analogically.
trans-unit.target: 当与稀疏矩阵（即 P*S )结合使用时，通过置换矩阵进行乘法和除法也有效地工作，其中 P 为置换矩阵， S 为稀疏矩阵对稀疏矩阵的行进行置换并返回稀疏矩阵。表达式 S*P ， P\S ， S/P 类似地工作。

trans-unit.source: Nested Functions
trans-unit.target: 嵌套函数

trans-unit.source: Nested functions are similar to subfunctions in that only the main function is visible outside the file. However, they also allow for child functions to access the local variables in their parent function. This shared access mimics using a global variable to share information — but a global variable which is not visible to the rest of Octave. As a programming strategy, sharing data this way can create code which is difficult to maintain. It is recommended to use subfunctions in place of nested functions when possible.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套函数与子函数类似，因为在文件外部仅可见主函数。但是，它们还允许子函数访问其父函数中的局部变量。这种共享访问模仿了使用全局变量共享信息的情况，但是使用了一个全局变量，该变量对八度音阶的其余部分不可见。作为一种编程策略，以这种方式共享数据可能会创建难以维护的代码。建议尽可能使用子功能代替嵌套功能。
